ayada wiwahakayi. 1998 - shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe welenda sewayen pawathwana lada “obe katahanda thama mathakayi“ niwedaka pranama uleledi katahandin karana lada anupama mehewara wenuwen upahara thilinayakin pidum labima. 1999 - mulu diwayinatama balapana andamin sama winisuruwarayeku lesa path kara atha. 2000 - shri lanka pramithi aayathana widhayaka niladharinge sangamayata karana lada mehewara wenuwen upahara thilinayakin pidum labiya. 2001 – “le parithyagashilinge illim“ wadasatahana wasara 30 kata adhika kalayak swechchawen idiripath karamin jathika le dime sewayata karana lada amila sewaya wenuwen boralasgamuwa ekamuthu tharuna kala upahara pirinamima. 2002 – “handa mama“ lama wadasatahana wasara 42 k pirima nimiththen upahara sammanayakin pidum labima. 2003 - tawar hol rangahala padanama magin kala shilpin sandaha wu wishesha handunumpatha pirinamima. 2004 - anka 1948 darana boralasgamuwa dharmarajikashrama wiharastha muthuhara lama samajayata karana lada suwishesha mehewara wenuwen upahara thilinayakin pidum labima. 2004 – “desha prasada madhya kala kirthi“ sammanayen pidum labima saha 40 wasarak “handa mama“ lama wadasatahanin daruwanta aalokayak laba dima wenuwen boralasgamuwa dharmarajakashrama wiharastha dayaka sabhawa upahara thilinayak pirinamima. 2004 - sanskruthika amathyanshaya shri lanka rakshana sansthawa ha eekabaddhawa kala shilpin sandaha pirinamanu labana “prathibha pranama“ rakshana oppu pirinamima. 2004 - ambalangoda dharmashoka widyalaye aadi shishyayeku lesa madhya kshethraya thula dakwana kusalatha hethuwen widyalayata gena dun kirthiya wenuwen wishishta kusalatha sammanayakin pidum labima. 2004 - sanskruthika departhumenthuwa pirinamana “kalabhushana“ sammanayen pidum labima. 2004 – jayawardhanapura guna samaru padanamin “desha prasada madhya kala kirthi“ gaurawa sammanayen pidum labima. 2006 - shri lanka janamadhya padanama “prawina guwan widuli shilpi“ gaurawa sammanaya pirinamima. 2007 - kolambaa aananda widyaliya prawruththi wikashana eekakaya, janamadhya unnathiya udesa karana lada mehewara wenuwen upahara pirinamima. 2009 - shri lanka wishwa samadhi sama padanama “deshabandu“ gaurawa sammanaya pirinamima.
